card.name: Cosmo Cebu Lambda, the Super Electromagnetic

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your fire or nature creatures. ■ Meteorburn—Whenever this creature attacks, you may put a card under this creature into your graveyard. If you do, draw 3 cards. {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ At the start of your turn, you may put a non-evolution creature from your hand under this creature.

card.name: Experience the Miracle! Re Born Kaiser

property.name: Rules

card.name: Invincible Operation, Grand General of the Galaxy Falcon Squadron

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When your Roar of Jack, Commander of the Galaxy Falcon Squadron wins a battle, you may put this creature from your hand into the battle zone. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, if you have Roar of Jack, Commander of the Galaxy Falcon Squadron in the battle zone, choose 3 of your opponent's shields and put them into their owner's graveyard. {HUNTING} (While battling, this creature gets +1000 power for each of your Hunters in the battle zone.) {TRIPLE BREAKER}

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your water or darkness creatures. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, look at the top 3 cards of your deck. From among them, choose a non-evolution creature and put it under this creature. Then put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When this creature is destroyed, put all non-evolution creatures that were under it into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ Evolution—Put on one of your multicolored creatures. {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever one of your non-psychic creatures are destroyed, you may put a light, darkness or fire Alien psychic creature that costs 7 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. (At the start of the game, psychic creatures aren't put into your deck and are put into your hyperspatial zone, and if a psychic creature is put into a zone other than the battle zone, they are returned there.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ This creature gets +5000 power for each of your other Hunters in the battle zone. {CREW BREAKER}-Hunter(This creature breaks one more shield for each of your other creatures in the battle zone that has Hunter in its race.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ Whenever one of your opponent's creatures attacks and isn't blocked, untap this creature. ■ While blocking, this creature gets +2000 power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Space Charge (When you put a card into your mana zone, you may use this creature's {SPACE CHARGE}ability.) ■ This creature gets the {SPACE CHARGE}abilities of all other Aliens in the battle zone not named Space Cebu Poseidon. ■ Whenever your opponent chooses one of your other Aliens in the battle zone by the effect of a spell or ability of a creature, you may draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. Reveal one and put it into your hand, then put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. If the card revealed this way was a fire or nature card, you may choose a creature and return it to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy one of your psychic creatures. If you can't, destroy this creature. {DOUBLE BREAKER}

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone or whenever it attacks, you may destroy one of your creatures. If you do, your opponent chooses one of their creatures and destroys it. {DOUBLE BREAKER}

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ One of your creatures can attack untapped creatures until the end of the turn. {CHARGER} (After you cast this spell, put it into your mana zone instead of your graveyard.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Each of your Aliens in the battle zone, your mana zone, and your graveyard is a Hunter in addition to its other races. ■ Each of your Hunters in the battle zone, your mana zone, and your graveyard is an Alien in addition to its other races. ■ Whenever this creature would lose a battle and be destroyed, it stays in the battle zone instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) {MULTI SPACE CHARGE}: Light / Darkness (Whenever you put a Light and/or Darkness card into your mana zone, you may use this creature's Space Charge ability.) Light: Choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap it: {SPACE CHARGE}Darkness: Choose one of your opponent's tapped creatures in the battle zone and destroy it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {MULTI SPACE CHARGE}: Light / Fire (Whenever you put a Light and/or Fire card into your mana zone, you may use this creature's Space Charge ability.) Light: At the end of the turn, untap one of your creatures: {SPACE CHARGE}Fire: This turn, when you put a creature into the battle zone, it gets "speed attacker" and "power attacker +2000".

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) {MULTI SPACE CHARGE}: Water / Fire (Whenever you put a Water and/or Fire card into your mana zone, you may use this creature's Space Charge ability.) Water: One of your creatures in the battle zone can't be blocked until the end of the turn: {SPACE CHARGE}Fire: One of your creatures in the battle zone gets "Power attacker +4000" and breaks an additional shield until the end of the turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) {MULTI SPACE CHARGE}: Water / Nature (Whenever you put a Water and/or Nature card into your mana zone, you may use this creature's Space Charge ability.) Water: Draw a card: {SPACE CHARGE}Nature: Look at the top 2 cards of your deck. You may put a creature from among them into your hand and put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) {MULTI SPACE CHARGE}: Darkness / Nature (Whenever you put a Darkness and/or Nature card into your mana zone, you may use this creature's Space Charge ability.) Darkness: Return a creature from your graveyard to your hand: {SPACE CHARGE}Nature: This turn, the next creature you summon costs up to 2 less to summon. It can't cost less than 1.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {HUNTING} (While battling, this creature gets +1000 power for each of your Hunters in the battle zone.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Choose one of your non-evolution creatures in the battle zone and add it to your shields face down. If you put a darkness or fire creature into the shield zone in this way, you may draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap it. That creature does not untap at the start of your opponent's next turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ This creature can't attack. ■ Loop Awaken— Whenever this creature blocks or is attacked, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your graveyard, then flip this creature to the Geo Macho, Temporal Hyde side. (The attack is not canceled.) (At the start of the game, psychic creatures aren't put into your deck and are put into your hyperspatial zone, and if a psychic creature is put into a zone other than the battle zone, they are returned there.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ This creature gets +1000 power for each creature in your graveyard. ■ Loop Awaken—When this creature attacks your opponent and isn't blocked, flip this creature to the Zabi Gunman, Temporal Jekyll side.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ This creature can't attack. ■ When this creature leaves the battle zone, your opponent chooses one of their psychic creatures and destroys it.

card.name: Roar of Jack, Commander of the Galaxy Falcon Squadron

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature, choose one of the following: ► Put up to 2 Fire Bird psychic creatures that cost 3 or less from your hyperspatial zone: ► Put a Fire psychic creature that costs 6 or less from your hyperspatial zone. (At the start of the game, psychic creatures aren't put into your deck and are put into your hyperspatial zone, and if a psychic creature is put into a zone other than the battle zone, they are returned there.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When this creature would be discarded from your hand by the effect of one of your opponent's spells or ability of an opponent's creature, you may put it into the battle zone instead. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, search your deck. You may take a Hachiko, Jin's Faithful Dog from your deck, show that creature to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Put all cards in your graveyard into your mana zone tapped.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Tap one of your creatures. Until the start of your next turn, each of your opponent's creatures must attack the creature tapped in this way if able. If a water or darkness creature was tapped in this way, you may draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ This creature can't attack. {SLAYER} (Whenever this creature battles, destroy the other creature after the battle.) ■ When this creature would be destroyed, you may discard a light card from your hand instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) {POWER ATTACKER} +2000 (While attacking, this creature gets +2000 power.) ■ When this creature would be destroyed, add it to your shields face down instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may draw 2 cards. If you do, discard 2 cards from your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) {SLAYER} (Whenever this creature battles, destroy the other creature after the battle.) ■ When this creature would be destroyed, you may put it into your mana zone instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {HUNTING} (While battling, this creature gets +1000 power for each of your Hunters in the battle zone.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever your opponent would choose a creature in the battle zone, your tapped psychic creatures can't be chosen. (They can still be attacked or blocked.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ Choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap it. Then for each of your Hunters in the battle zone, choose another one of their creatures and tap it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ This creature can't attack. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, your opponent chooses a card from their hand and discards it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Return a creature from your graveyard to your hand. If a light or nature creature was returned in this way, you may draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Each of your Dragons in the battle zone gets +2000 power. (At the start of the game, psychic creatures aren't put into your deck and are put into your hyperspatial zone, and if a psychic creature is put into a zone other than the battle zone, they are returned there.)

alternate.name: Gaial Ryusei Dragon, Star Dragon King

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Each of your creatures in the battle zone gets "speed attacker". ■ Your opponent's psychic creatures can't attack or block. ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may put up to 2 cards from the top of your deck into your graveyard. For each card put into your graveyard in this way, put a psychic creature that has that card's cost or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. {TRIPLE BREAKER} {LINK RELEASE} (When this creature leaves the battle zone, choose one of its psychic cells and return it to your hyperspatial zone and flip the rest of the cards.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Psychic Link—At the start of your turn, if you have Forever Kaiser, the Meteor and Ukon Pippi in the battle zone, link them to this creature and flip this creature to its higher cost side. (At the start of the game, psychic creatures aren't put into your deck and are put into your hyperspatial zone, and if a psychic creature is put into a zone other than the battle zone, they are returned there.)

alternate.name: Gaial Ryusei Dragon, Star Dragon King

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Each of your creatures in the battle zone gets "speed attacker". ■ Your opponent's psychic creatures can't attack or block. ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may put up to 2 cards from the top of your deck into your graveyard. For each card put into your graveyard in this way, put a psychic creature that has that card's cost or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. {TRIPLE BREAKER} {LINK RELEASE} (When this creature leaves the battle zone, choose one of its psychic cells and return it to your hyperspatial zone and flip the rest of the cards.)

card.name: Ace of Swords, Ensign of the Galaxy Falcon Squadron

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When one of your creatures wins a battle, you may put this creature from your hand into the battle zone. {HUNTING} (While battling, this creature gets +1000 power for each of your Hunters in the battle zone.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has "blocker". ■ If you have a light or water creature in the battle zone, you may draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ At the start of your turn, you may put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. {HUNTING} (While battling, this creature gets +1000 power for each of your Hunters in the battle zone.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, put a card from your mana zone into your graveyard. Then you may draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. Then put a card from your mana zone into your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This spell is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ Choose a shield in a player's shield zone and look at it. Then choose a shield in a player's shields and put it into its owner's graveyard. Its owner adds the top card of their deck into their shields face down. ■ Put a psychic creature that costs 5 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. (At the start of the game, psychic creatures aren't put into your deck and are put into your hyperspatial zone, and if a psychic creature is put into a zone other than the battle zone, they are returned there.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This spell is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ Tap all your opponent's creatures that have power 2000 or less. ■ Put a psychic creature that costs 5 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. (At the start of the game, psychic creatures aren't put into your deck and are put into your hyperspatial zone, and if a psychic creature is put into a zone other than the battle zone, they are returned there.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This spell is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ Each of your creatures in the battle zone gets "power attacker +2000" and can't be blocked until the end of the turn. ■ Put a psychic creature that costs 5 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. (At the start of the game, psychic creatures aren't put into your deck and are put into your hyperspatial zone, and if a psychic creature is put into a zone other than the battle zone, they are returned there.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This spell is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ Each of your creatures in the battle zone gets +1000 power for each card in your hand until the end of the turn. ■ Put a psychic creature that costs 5 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. (At the start of the game, psychic creatures aren't put into your deck and are put into your hyperspatial zone, and if a psychic creature is put into a zone other than the battle zone, they are returned there.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This spell is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ Put a creature from your graveyard into your mana zone. ■ Put a psychic creature that costs 5 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. (At the start of the game, psychic creatures aren't put into your deck and are put into your hyperspatial zone, and if a psychic creature is put into a zone other than the battle zone, they are returned there.)

card.name: Joan of Arc, Goddess of Victory

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, whenever this creature attacks or whenever this creature blocks, you may choose up to 2 of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap them. {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever your opponent would choose a creature in the battle zone by the effect of a fire spell or the ability of a fire creature, they can't choose this one.

card.name: Super Spell Great Blue, the Blue Tide

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone or whenever it attacks, look at the top card of your deck. If it's a spell, you may cast it for no cost. {DOUBLE BREAKER}

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may put a non-evolution creature from your hand into the battle zone. {TRIPLE BREAKER}

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ If you have 3 or more water cards in your mana zone, this creature gets "shield trigger". ■ If you have 3 or more fire cards in your mana zone, this creature gets +4000 power and "double breaker". ■ If you have 7 or more water and/or fire cards in your mana zone, this creature gets "Whenever this creature breaks a shield, put it on top of its owner's deck instead."

property.name: Rules
property.value: {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature or another creature into the battle zone, you may choose another creature in the battle zone. If you do, those 2 creatures battle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Your opponent's psychic creatures can't attack players. {DOUBLE BREAKER}

alternate.name: Gaial Ryusei Dragon, Star Dragon King

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Each of your creatures in the battle zone gets "speed attacker". ■ Your opponent's psychic creatures can't attack or block. ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may put up to 2 cards from the top of your deck into your graveyard. For each card put into your graveyard in this way, put a psychic creature that has that card's cost or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. {TRIPLE BREAKER} {LINK RELEASE} (When this creature leaves the battle zone, choose one of its psychic cells and return it to your hyperspatial zone and flip the rest of the cards.)
